titles.title: A bill to designate the Courthouse and Post Office Building at 83 Meeting Street in Charleston, South Carolina, as the "Ernest Frederick Hollings Charleston Judicial Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 7/1/1987--Introduced. Designates a building on Meeting Street in Charleston, South Carolina, as the Ernest Frederick Hollings Charleston Judicial Building.
